name: Detetive Carioca
description:
Attention detectives! The organization known as G.A.N.G.U.E. (Group of Assaulters, Notable, Geniouses and Ultra Evil) are at large in the city of Rio de Janeiro, and it's up to you to help the police to solve several disappearances happening in town!

Nobody knows how, but G.A.N.G.U.E. is planning to steal several important city characteristics, like the sugar from Sugar Loaf, the Flamengo's crowd, the Samba from the Carnival and many other qualities that makes the city of Rio de Janeiro unique in the world!

Don't waste any time! Get your accessories and visit places like Rodrigo de Freitas lagoon, Christ the Redeemer, Maracanã Stadium and Copacabana beach; interview witnesses, get the arrest warrant and do not let the suspect get away with the city wonders!
